issue.title: [Java] Make BaseAllocator.Config public
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12164](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12164). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Alternatively we could make RootAllocator take immutable config.  The problem is that default config cannot be used from shaded binaries because it is package private.
